question_id: Tampilkan bahasa yang tidak memiliki satu pun film berating 'R'.
sql_query:
SELECT
  l.name AS bahasa
FROM lannguage AS l
WHERE
  l.lannguage_id NOT IN (
    SELECT
      fl.language_id
    FROM film AS fl
    WHERE
      fl.rating = 'R'
  )
raw_response:
```sql
SELECT
  l.name AS bahasa
FROM lannguage AS l
WHERE
  l.lannguage_id NOT IN (
    SELECT
      fl.language_id
    FROM film AS fl
    WHERE
      fl.rating = 'R'
  );
```
